Fibonacci with Break

//Init
1 01 1 11 1111 1 11111
0 11 0 00 0011 0 00001
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 11 0 00 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 00 0011 0 00001
0 01 0 00 0011 0 00001

//Loop Start
1 01 1 11 1111 1 11111
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 11111
0 01 1 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00010
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000

//Check Exit Condition (Number below Zero)
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 01 1 11 1111 1 11111
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
1 11 1 11 1111 1 11111
0 01 0 10 0001 0 00000
1 01 1 11 1111 1 11111
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 11 0011 0 00000

//Jmp to Loop
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00111
0 00 0 01 0000 1 00000

//Infinit Loop
1 00 0 00 0000 0 11001
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 00 0 00 0000 1 00000
